import React from 'react' import { useGlobalContext } from './context' const CartItem = ({ id, img, title, price, amount }) => { const { removeCartItem, increaseItemCount } = useGlobalContext(); return (

{title}

${price}

{/* remove button */}
{/* increase amount */} {/* amount */}

{amount}

{/* decrease amount */}
) } export default CartItem
